relation: This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(28)SB.
This command was integrated into Cisco IOS Release 12.2(33)SRE.
This command was implemented on Cisco ASR 1000 series routers.
pageTitle: Cisco IOS Broadband Access Aggregation and DSL Command Reference - management server password through sessions throttle [Support] - Cisco

If a host receives this tag, it must be returned unmodified in the subsequent PPPoE Active Discovery Request (PADR.), 356885=Other vendors have their own unique vendor IDs, options, and associated VSAs. textBeforeTable: Syntax Description passwd [ encryption-type | cleartext-password ] password server management To specify the customer premise equipment (CPE) password that is used in the authentication phase, use the management server passwordcommand in TR-069 Agent configuration mode. management server password sessions throttle session retry limit sessions per-vlan throttle sessions pre-auth limit ignore sessions per-vlan limit sessions per-vc limit sessions per-mac limit sessions per-mac iwf limit sessions max limit service vpdn group sessions threshold service relay service profile service netflow timeout service name match service local service deny rx-speed request outstanding relay pppoe bba-group rbe nasip range pvc radius-server vsa send pvc-in-range provision code protocol pppovlan dot1q protocol pppoe (ATM VC) pppoe-sessions threshold pppoe service pppoe server remote-id delay pppoe server circuit-id delay pppoe pads disable-ac-info pppoe max-sessions pppoe limit per-vlan pppoe limit per-vc
textAfterTable: Command Modes TR-069 Agent configuration (config-cwmp) Command History Release Modification 12.4(20)T This command was introduced. Examples Thefollowing example shows how to specify the CPE password that is used in the authentication phase. In this example, the password is cisco and is not encrypted:  Device(config-cwmp)# management server password 0 cisco management server url To specify the HTTP or HTTPS URL to reach the auto-configuration server (ACS), use the management server urlcommand in TR-069 Agent configuration mode. management server url acs-url Syntax Description acs-url The HTTP/HTTPS URL to reach the ACS. This URL is used by the CPE to establish
